This offer is our way of saying "thank you!" to the LET community for supporting us during our difficult time earlier this month (the entire event is described in detail in http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/3473/ipxcore ). 

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Adam and I have been doing Internet services since 2003 as Digital Design Core. We moved into the VPS market in May of 2011 as IPXcore. We started this because we were on a BurstNET node that kept getting oversold, and we were unable to get any form of support. We decided that we could do better.

We have recently added Harley and Will to our support staff, bringing our total up to 5.

Due to complications with our prior datacenter, we have moved *all* of our equipment to Buffalo, NY, in Colocrossing's datacenter there. Colocrossing Buffalo is currently using Level 3 exclusively, with other providers being laid down right now.

We're running OpenVZ virtualization on our very own Dell, HP, and Supermicro Opteron-powered hardware.

All server nodes have 100mbit connection, sharing a 1gbit uplink.
